meanings.sent1: My paesani and I celebrate our national holidays together.
meanings.sent2: The paesani from my hometown always gather for a yearly reunion.
meanings.sent3: My paesani and I always argue about which food is better: pizza or pasta.
meanings.sent4: Even though we come from different backgrounds, we are all paesani in this foreign land.
meanings.sent5: The bond between paesani is unbreakable, no matter the distance.

meanings.definition: A person from the same village or town.
meanings.sent1: Growing up, all my paesani played together in the town square.
meanings.sent2: The paesani in our small village always support each other in times of need.
meanings.sent3: When the town fair comes around, all the paesani come out to enjoy the festivities.
meanings.sent4: In our close-knit community, being a paesani means always having someone to rely on.
meanings.sent5: The sense of belonging among paesani is truly heartwarming.

meanings.sent1: My paesani and I have been friends since we were kids.
meanings.sent2: I can always count on my paesani to have my back in any situation.
meanings.sent3: Even though we bicker like siblings, my paesani is always there for me.
meanings.sent4: To me, my paesani is like a beacon of light in the darkest of times.
meanings.sent5: The laughter shared with paesani is the best medicine for a bad day.
